statements: UPDATE InfluencerPartnerships SET communication_history = 'Updated communication' WHERE partnership_id = 1
UPDATE InfluencerPartnerships SET influencer_name = 'New Influencer', brand_name = 'New Brand', contract_details = '{"terms": "revised"}' WHERE partnership_id = 2
UPDATE InfluencerPartnerships SET communication_history = 'Meeting scheduled for next week' WHERE partnership_id = 1001
UPDATE InfluencerPartnerships SET influencer_name = 'Sarah Smith', contract_details = '{"start_date": "2022-05-01", "end_date": "2023-04-30", "payment_terms": "Net 30"}' WHERE brand_name = 'XYZ Corp'
UPDATE Influencers SET communication_history = 'Called client yesterday' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Contracts SET contract_status = 'Active', contract_details = 'Extended payment terms' WHERE contract_id = 2;
UPDATE Influencers SET communication_history = 'Met with client A and discussed new projects' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Contracts SET contract_status = 'Active', contract_details = 'Client B, project XYZ, start date: 2022-01-10, end date: 2022-06-30' WHERE contract_id = 2;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers = 500 WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Partnerships SET partner_name = 'Company XYZ', start_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE partnership_id = 101;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers = followers + 100 WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Partnerships SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE partnership_id = 1;
UPDATE Influencers SET influencer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Partnerships SET status = 'Active', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE partnership_id = 2;
UPDATE Influencers SET influencer_name = 'John Doe', influencer_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Partnerships SET status = 'Active', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE partnership_id = 5;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE influencer_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE Brands SET industry = 'Fashion' WHERE brand_id = 'xyz456';
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 1000, partnership_start_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE influencer_id = '97f283f6-4ef3-4d4d-adcd-fdeb6cbdfb3b';
UPDATE Brands SET industry = 'Fashion', contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE brand_id = 'a1b4c80d-62e9-4711-bd86-ef087b107f22';
